tagline: More Than Just a Pretty Beach

challenges.title: Beachfront Electrical Resilience
challenges.description: Deerfield's oceanside properties require extra protection from the elements. We use non-corrosive fixtures and heavy-duty seals for all coastal installations.

challenges.title: Industrial Corridor Power

challenges.title: Suburban Safety Upgrades
challenges.description: With many mature neighborhoods, Deerfield homes often need safety audits to ensure older panels and wiring meet today's high energy demands.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Deerfield Beach?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Deerfield Beach including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Deerfield Beach neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Deerfield Beach?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Broward County permits for electrical work in Deerfield Beach, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Deerfield Beach home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Deerfield Beach homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Deerfield Beach.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Deerfield Beach?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Deerfield Beach neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you provide emergency service in Deerfield Beach communities like The Cove?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency response to all Deerfield Beach neighborhoods, ensuring your power is restored quickly and safely.

faqs.question: Can you handle commercial electrical projects in Deerfield business parks?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide full commercial electrical support, including tenant improvements, lighting design, and emergency services for Deerfield businesses.

seoContent.heading: Deerfield Beach's Trusted Local Electricians
seoContent.body: Deerfield Beach is a city of incredible variety, from its pristine shores to its bustling corporate centers. It's a place where tradition meets progress, and Solomon Electric has been there since 2003, providing the reliable electrical foundation Deerfield homes and businesses need to flourish.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Deerfield Beach's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Deerfield Beach homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Broward County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Deerfield Beach's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Deerfield Beach Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Deerfield Beach. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Corner of Deerfield Beach with Excellence
seoContent.body: Whether you're finishing a remodel in Deer Creek, upgrading the lighting at The Cove, or needing urgent help at a local industrial property, Solomon Electric is your first choice. We bring 15 years of licensed experience and a commitment to quality that our Deerfield neighbors trust.
